text: UFC fighter Ronda Rousey put her best face forward on her wedding day. The athlete called in her beloved glam squad to Hawaii to help her primp ahead of her intimate backyard wedding to MMA fighter Travis Browne. Her goal, while using longtime makeup artist Hee Soo, was to put forth a fresh, barely - there makeup look. “ She really didn ’ t have a lot on, ” Soo told E! News this week. “ She is an athlete. They tend to have really beautiful skin because they sweat and work out so much. Your natural sweat cleans out your pores. ” Along with her no - frills wedding, Rousey wanted a similar vibe for her hair and makeup. The bride, who looked resplendent in a Galia Lahav couture gown
